photos.title: Still Life with Tradescantia pallida and Zojirushi NZB-R03
photos.alt: A red rice cooker sits on a small, wooden pallet, itself on a laminate countertop. In front hangs a purple and green wandering Jew. Behind, a gas stovetop.

photos.title: Leaving Town
photos.alt: Passenger train cars in red, blue, and silver livery wait in their tracks. Behind, low buildings, and even further, pale mountains. The sky above is a daytime blue. Framing the scene on the left is the shadowed, graffitied wall of a building. A dumpster sits next to the sunlit yellow wall on the right. A line connects the two buildings, upon which a bird sits, shaded

photos.title: Chalk and Carnations
photos.alt: In black and white: various sizes of sidewalk chalk and a few carnations rest on a manhole cover situated within a public park.

photos.title: The Century
photos.alt: Close-up of a spinning white Ferris wheel. Four deep blue cabins are adorned with the words “Navy Pier”. A large, circular LED screen is attached to the face of the Ferris wheel, displaying orange bokeh. There is photographic white bokeh and a motion blur in front of the scene.

photos.title: Glass Wilderness
photos.alt: A red-orange glass sculpture, resembling a crane, peeks out from behind a lush, leafy landscape.

photos.title: Days Alone
photos.alt: On an overcast day rests a small, somber island covered in trees. The trees bleed into their reflections in the water.

photos.title: Pinball
photos.alt: Close-up of a warm, glowing pinball machine. Several components are lit up.

photos.title: Seabreeze Pier
photos.alt: On a partly cloudy day, a rocky pier juts out into the deep blue water. At the end of the pier sits a stout red-and-white lighthouse. The path, as well as the rocks, are covered in ice.

photos.title: Mushrooms at the Fenway Victory Gardens
photos.alt: Close-up of hundreds of small, brown and beige mushrooms. They are surrounded by grass and a single tree leaf sits in front. In the background sits fences and other structures.

photos.title: Up Before Fall
photos.alt: From underneath, white-barked trees with red, green, and yellow leaves. A lens flare crosses the trees into a bright blue sky.

photos.title: Adirondacks Sitting Beside the Pool
photos.alt: Two red, white, and blue Adirondack chairs. In front, splashes of poolwater are suspended like cellophane.

photos.title: May as Well
photos.alt: Low-fidelity view of lakewater, with trees and grass far in the background.
photos.notes: Album art for May as Well by Devin Brite
